This trend was consistent across both phases of polling, highlighting women's crucial role in this record-breaking election.

Watch: Modi, Bhutan King gold talks on energy, defence & connectivity
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s two-day visit to Bhutan marks a major step in strengthening India-Bhutan relations. During his talks with King Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck, the two leaders discussed cooperation in energy, defence, technology, and connectivity. They also inaugurated the 1,020 MW Punatsangchhu-II hydroelectric project, a key symbol of bilateral partnership. Modi’s visit coincides with the 70th birthday celebrations of Bhutan’s Fourth King and highlights India’s continued commitment to its “Neighbourhood First” policy.

title: Knicks mourn the passing of former star Micheal Ray Richardson
description: Former basketball star Micheal Ray Richardson has died. He played for the Knicks and Nets and was a four-time NBA All-Star. Richardson's career included overcoming substance abuse issues and coaching overseas. Tributes from the Knicks and his attorney praise his defensive skills and character. Isiah Thomas also spoke highly of his playing ability.

The EDC will now review the evidence and testimony.

description: In today’s crowded job market, sending endless applications often yields little result. Career expert Alan Stein advocates prioritizing networking over applying, introducing his “Five Chats Rule”—having five meaningful conversations weekly with professionals in target companies. These interactions build trust, uncover hidden opportunities, and give job-seekers a human edge, turning curiosity and connections into career growth.

title: Delhi blast: With three occupants in i20 car, does it rule out a fidayeen attack?
description: Security agencies are probing a Red Fort blast, questioning if a fidayeen attack is plausible with three occupants in the car. Initial theories pointed to a suicide mission, but multiple individuals and CCTV footage suggest otherwise. Investigators are exploring accidental detonation or a botched transport of explosives to another target.

title: Delhi blast: First lead to terror plot came from Jaish posters in J&K; attack in works for 2 yrs?
‘Don’t have notifications’: JPMorgan chief ignores most texts; keeps phone off at work
description: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon, despite leading a massive bank, limits his phone use at work, turning off notifications and ignoring texts unless from his children. He prioritizes focus in meetings, believing distractions hinder engagement. Dimon also advocates for US schools to evolve, integrating crucial skills like coding and cybersecurity to prepare students for the modern workforce.

title: Michael Willis Heard death: How TikTok star Yes King died
description: TikTok sensation Michael Willis Heard, known as 'Yes King,' has passed away. His daughter confirmed the news, remembering him for his uplifting videos promoting self-love and confidence. The Elyria, Ohio native, who also served as a life coach and pastor-like figure, inspired millions with his positive energy. His sudden departure has deeply saddened his global fanbase.

title: Belichick’s daughter-in-law appears to snub Jordon Hudson during UNC win
description: Tension simmered at a North Carolina football game as Bill Belichick's girlfriend, Jordon Hudson, and daughter-in-law, Jennifer Schmitt, reportedly kept their distance. This follows a public online spat, with Hudson's necklace seemingly referencing a rumored ban from team facilities. Despite the Tar Heels' wins, off-field family drama continues to draw attention.
